wikipedia_page.main: Graham Dunstan Martin (Leeds, United Kingdom, 21st October 1932 - 27th March 2021) was a British author, translator,  and philologist.

response: Selections from L'Imitation have been translated by William Jay Smith and Graham Dunstan Martin, and in its entirety by Peter Dale.
* Laforgue, Jules (1999). Jules Laforgue: Selected Poems. Trans. Graham Dunstan Martin. Penguin. .
* Anthology of Contemporary French Poetry Graham Dunstan Martin, editor, University of Texas Press, 1971
The Soul Master is a novel by Graham Dunstan Martin published in 1984.
Time-Slip is a novel by Graham Dunstan Martin published in 1986.
The Dream Wall is a novel by Graham Dunstan Martin published in 1987.
*Graham Dunstan Martin, 88, British author (The Soul Master, Time-Slip, The Dream Wall).Mr Graham Dunstan Martin
